short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fun maze game that plays in a popup.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Just click on the maze extension icon in the top right corner of your browser and the game will start immediately in a popup! 

The maze is randomly generated and different from each other in game start/restart. Try to solve the maze by moving the top-left red block to touch the green block at the bottom right corner in the given time (20s). The bar at the top of your maze shows how much time you have left. When the game ends, press the Restart button or the Space/Enter key to begin a new game.

Have fun with the maze game! If you'd like to play the game with bonus features or want to check the shortest path, simply click the corresponding links below the 'Restart' button. Additionally, we've added our new games at the bottom of game window and featured products after game over for extra enjoyment.
